# Financial Blog Template

> This repository provides a brand-agnostic Astro starter for financial content sites. It is intended to be cloned and customized by humans or LLM-based agents. Replace textual branding via `src/config/brand.ts`. Media URLs below are preserved intentionally and can be swapped later.

The template supports personal finance education and financial product content for the US market. It includes:

- Interactive credit card recommendation quizzes with personalized results
- Comprehensive financial guides covering budgeting, investing, and debt management
- Unbiased financial product comparisons and recommendations
- Mobile-optimized responsive design with enhanced blog reading experience
- SEO-optimized content structure following TOFU/MOFU marketing funnel strategies

The platform is built using modern web technologies including Astro, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, ensuring fast loading times and excellent user experience.

## LLM Starter Prompt

For LLM-based agents initiating a new site from this template, use the local starter prompt and fill variables before execution:

- lib/documents/LLM_STARTER_PROMPT.md
